articles.author: Anshuman Daga,Nupur Anand,Sumeet Chatterjee,Nupur Anand
articles.title: EXCLUSIVE DBS, StanChart weigh bids as Citi retreats from Asia consumer business - sources - Reuters
articles.description: Banks including DBS Group (DBSM.SI), Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), OCBC (OCBC.SI) and Standard Chartered (STAN.L) are set to bid for parts of Citigroup's (C.N) consumer business in Asia, people with direct knowledge of the matter said.
articles.content: A view of the exterior of the Citibank corporate headquarters in New York, New York, U.S. May 20, 2015. REUTERS/Mike Segar/File PhotoBanks including DBS Group (DBSM.SI), Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Grou… [+4210 chars]

articles.author: CHOO YUN TING
articles.title: 32 Singapore-based individuals in Forbes 30 Under 30 Asia list - The Straits Times
articles.description: Singapore was the fourth-most represented country on this year's list, after India, China and Japan.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - Thirty-two individuals in Singapore have been included in Forbes' 30 Under 30 Asia - a list which highlights 300 young entrepreneurs and trailblazers in various fields under the age of 30… [+2932 chars]

articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: DBS, StanChart among potential bidders for Citi's Asia consumer business - The Star Online
articles.description: SINGAPORE/HONG KONG: Banks including DBS Group, Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group (MUFG), OCBC and Standard Chartered are set to bid for parts of Citigroup's consumer business in Asia, people with direct knowledge of the matter told Reuters.

articles.title: 'Ah Long', bandung suit? Elvin Ng's not letting the Star Awards memes get to him - AsiaOne

articles.description: PETALING JAYA: Seven Malaysian youth made it to Forbes' "30 under 30 Asia" Class of 2021 for being recognised as part of Asia’s top 300 trailblazers and entrepreneurs.

articles.title: 1 killed, 16 injured after lorry carrying migrant workers rams into tipper truck on PIE - AsiaOne
articles.description: A 33-year-old migrant worker was killed on Tuesday (April 20) morning after a lorry crashed into a stationary tipper truck on the Pan-Island Expressway (PIE). There were 17 migrant workers, aged 23 to 46, travelling on the back of the lorry at the time. The a…

articles.title: Xi Jinping rebukes nations who ‘arrogantly instruct others and interfere’ - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Chinese president’s speech at Boao Forum for Asia comes amid international scrutiny of China and as US puts renewed emphasis on alliances in Asia and Europe.
